attributes.action: Seek pay rises for NHS staff shop workers and key workers.
attributes.additional_details: Because at the minute key workers are the foundation of this country and risk ourselves and our families for other people to little or no thanks from anyone. We have to put up with abuse and not following the guidelines by so many who think there immune.
attributes.background: Acknowledge that without these people risking there own lives on a daily basis people would suffer alot more than they already are

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Give a bonus to ALL the hard working key workers during this pandemic
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559833

Increase NHS and Social Care staff pay by 25%
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317721

Give all key workers a £10,000 tax break (in addition to the existing allowance)
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320647
